rationale: 'really high alert' is about readiness/concern, not an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective of the threat.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.

rationale: The phrase 'on really high alert' contains the critical alert phrase 'on high alert' with an intensifier 'really'.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.
